Text: Re Margin Agreements Smith Barney Bank One ABN Amrothe comparison chart Weve gone as far as we can with SSB The ball is in the traders court to look at and approve the numbers I dont know when if ever theyll do that They dont seem as interested as they once were I think were more or less on hold waiting for them SSB is aware of the development and said they will push the traders independently My schedule is fairly flexible so let me know when youd like to meet Ed Wood
